channel.title: TitanX 317 | 24 Skills | Perfect Combat | Stable Economy | Duo Slayer System |
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1vdFjxD.png[/img]
Navigation
[URL=http://titanx317.ddns.net/]Home[/URL] [URL=http://titanx317.ddns.net/forums/]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://titanx317.ddns.net/forums/index.php?/forum/41-titanx-client-download/]Download[/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
[B]Welcome[/B] Get ready to see the best content-wise server online. PvM/Economy based but PKing is welcome TitanX 317 offers all 23 of OSRS skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play. We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community. Donating for ranks IS NOT required. We do weekly giveaways for items, exp boosts, drops and donator ranks.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
[B]Stability[/B] TitanX 317 contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind TitanX 317 is written well by Beast(HostRaptor). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server.. The server is very optimized, don't expect any lag at all whilst playing.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
- Loading 667 Data with 474 Maps - Fullscreen/Resizable/Fixed - Zooming - All skills working - Flawless Combat - Perfect bosses - Bounty hunter - Working minigames - Duo Slayer system - Hundreds of achievements - Lots of points systems - Regular Updates - Custom Framework - HD Graphics - Music system So much more!
Skills
Fishing - All fish can be caught - Barbarian fishing - Custom Rocktail and cavefish spot - Bait required for some fishing spots
Cooking - All Fish can be cooked - Fish burning with correct levels - Cooking gloves - Lumbridge range provides a lower burn chance
Prayer: - All bones buriable - All bones can be used on an altar - All prayers & curses work - Can combine god pages to make the books
Fletching - All logs cuttable - Stringing bows - Arrows - Bolts - Pick and spin flax
Agility - Gnome Agility Course - Barbarian Agility Course - Wilderness Agility Course
Hunter - 100% Puro Puro - Chinchompas - Bird Snares - Falconry - Butterflies
Mining - Custom Mining Animation - All ores minable
Firemaking - Backwards firmaking - All logs burnable - Ring of fire/flame gloves - 100% inferno adze - Beacons
Runecrafting - All runes are craftable - Abyss - Multiple runes
Smithing - Correct Smithing Interface's - All armours smithable - All weapons smithable - DFS Creation
Woodcutting - 100% inferno adze - All trees can be cut - All hatchets can be used - Random bird nests - Correct stump ids - Jadinko and ivy cutting
Slayer - Kuradal's dungeon - Slayer bosses - NPC's are slayer level based - Slayer helmet works/recolouring - Great XP rates - Lots of tasks w/point shop
Farming - 99.9% Farming Trees, Herbs, Flowers, Produce.
Summoning - All Familiars - Special Attacks for all familiars - Pouch creation - Scroll creation - Active familiars with correct saving and timings - Pets - All obelisks work
Thieving - Pickpocketing - Stalls
Dungeoneering (Custom For Now) - Ring of Kingship - Party up for floors - 4 Custom floors
Bosses
- Godwars - Slash bash - Nex - Corp beast - Chaos Elemental - KBD - Tormented Demons - Revs and more
Minigames
- Duel Arena - Barrows - Fight Pits - Fight Cave - Ranging Guild - Warriors Guild - Pest Control - Conquest Arena - Fishing Trawler - Soul Wars
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3SRtis7.png[/img][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/grlg19d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JMXVA0c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4WuNfSg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mxTXFIr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HavLtmh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0h0tssX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9N0PEXh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hpHykgZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ETWk9sW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zIfCSk3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/h1IOFyA.png[/img] [IMG]http://[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VsBPeik.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/utiA5VB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sWZB8aF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ew3XIvj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rtndksU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J804r4X.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gCmfiYB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tRCOskO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MRC4LbM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qtzvQcl.png[/img]

item.title: TitanX 317 | 24 Skills | Perfect Combat | Stable Economy | Duo Slayer System |
item.dc:creator: @CleanCut CleanCut
item.description:

Besides the whole nomad thing, is there any interesting content that I wouldn’t find on any other server?

[B]Welcome[/B]
Get ready to see the best content-wise server online. PvM/Economy based but PKing is welcome
TitanX 317 offers all 23 of OSRS skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play.
We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community. Donating for ranks IS NOT required. We do weekly giveaways for items, exp boosts, drops and donator ranks.

[B]Stability[/B]
TitanX 317 contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind TitanX 317 is written well by Beast(HostRaptor). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server… The server is very optimized, don’t expect any lag at all whilst playing.
